devdoc.author: Pantherprotocol Contributors
devdoc.details: This contract lives on Ethereum chain and asks from PantherRewardController to release $ZKP rewards and then if there are releasable $ZKPs, it interacts with the ETH<->Polygon bridge to send them to the Polygon chain via Polygon FXRoot contract. Anyone can try to release and bridge ZKPs. This contract also bridge the data which contains the address of user who has bridged ZKPs along with the specific grant type (ZKP_RELEASE_AND_BRIDGE_PRP_GRANT_TYPE) which then is used to grant PRP rewards to the user.

FX_ROOT.details: `FxRoot` is the contract of the "Fx-Portal" on the mainnet/Goerli.
